task.title: Step 1 - Create a New Report Suite
task.shortdesc: Create a report suite so Analytics knows where to process and store your data.

step.cmd: Login to reporting and analytics, and then click Admin > Admin Console > Report Suites.
Input the Report Suite ID (Abbreviated RSID).

info.p: This is how our database and your page code identifies your report suite. It can be any string of alpha-numeric characters with a static prefix that cannot be changed. Since this is going to be a test report suite, place test or dev at the end of the RSID so it doesn't get mistaken for actual data. It is not required to input the prefix in the RSID field. Analytics attaches the prefix for you. If you type the prefix in the RSID, you end up with a report suite ID that contains a duplicate prefix.
This is the friendly name, or what you see in reports.

step.cmd: Input the Time Zone and Go Live Date.
Input the Estimated Page Views per Day.

info.p: This is required so our network operations team knows approximately how much resources they want to put towards this report suite.
